record.title: RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR
record.narrative:
RECESS SUBJECT TO THE CALL OF THE CHAIR -- (Senate - June 10, 2008)

[Page: S5418]

speaking.paragraph: So, Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate be in recess subject to the call of the Chair.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 2:19 p.m., recessed subject to the call of the Chair and reassembled at 3:33 p.m. when called to order by the Presiding Officer (Mr. SANDERS).
